text: It is well known that my Landlord was a pleasing and a facetious man,

author: Scott, Walter

title: The Black Dwarf
author: Scott, Walter

title: The Black Dwarf

title: The Black Dwarf

text: The ideal being who is here presented as residing in solitude, and
title: The Black Dwarf

title: The Black Dwarf

title: The Black Dwarf

title: The Black Dwarf

title: The Black Dwarf

text: unfortunate man's name was David Ritchie, a native of Tweeddale. He was
title: The Black Dwarf
author: Scott, Walter

text: the son of a labourer in the slate-quarries of Stobo, and must have
title: The Black Dwarf

title: The Black Dwarf

title: The Black Dwarf
author: Scott, Walter

title: The Black Dwarf

author: Scott, Walter

title: The Black Dwarf
author: Scott, Walter

title: The Black Dwarf
author: Scott, Walter

title: The Black Dwarf
author: Scott, Walter

title: The Black Dwarf
author: Scott, Walter

title: The Black Dwarf

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter
